backend/main.mo: Defines the main canister with user, business, customer, item, and invoice data models, storage maps, and authorization/storage mixins. Adds bill-to and ship-to override fields and GST filing-related types.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old invoices to new invoices by adding bill-to and ship-to override fields initialized to null. Transforms invoicesByUser maps to the updated structure.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, associated files, components, and test IDs for invoice address overrides, print updates, and layout fixes.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains short summaries of many frontend components, describing their responsibilities such as dialogs, editors, pages, PWA setup, and print CSS improvements.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based stylesheet defining color tokens, theming variables, dark mode values, and applying base layout rules.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry file configuring PWA metadata, icons, and splash screens for various devices.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app metadata, start URL, display mode, colors, and icons.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing caching strategies for static assets and navigation requests.
frontend/SMOKE_TEST.md: Manual smoke test checklist covering authentication, admin panel flows, user management, and navigation to verify critical app functions after deployment.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component setting up error boundaries, themes, routing, React Query, and service worker registration.
frontend/src/components/admin/AddUserDia: Admin modal for creating users with email, password, mobile, role, and optional access expiry handling.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminCrede: Admin-only login form using credentials instead of Internet Identity, with validation and error display.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminOnlyG: Wrapper component that checks admin status and shows loading or access-denied screens before rendering children.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminPorta: Layout wrapper for admin pages with title header and optional back-to-admin navigation.
frontend/src/components/admin/CreateCred: Empty placeholder file for a credential creation dialog.
frontend/src/components/admin/Credential: Empty placeholder file intended for a credentials listing table.
frontend/src/components/admin/ResetPassw: Empty placeholder file for an admin password reset dialog.
frontend/src/components/admin/RevokeCred: Empty placeholder file for a credential revocation dialog.
frontend/src/components/admin/SetAccessU: Admin dialog to set or clear user access expiry dates, with validation and backend update logic.
frontend/src/components/admin/SetCredent: Empty placeholder file for a credential role-setting dialog.
frontend/src/components/admin/UsersTable: Admin table listing all users with delete, access, and dashboard actions, handling loading, errors, and empty states.
frontend/src/components/AppAccessGate.ts: No-op wrapper component retained for compatibility that simply renders its children.
frontend/src/components/AppAccessLoginFo: Deprecated login form component showing a notice that Internet Identity is required.
frontend/src/components/AppErrorBoundary: React error boundary that catches application errors and shows a fallback screen.
frontend/src/components/AppShell.tsx: Main app layout with header, navigation, footer, and container for page content.
frontend/src/components/auth/CredentialS: Form for credential-based sign-in with client validation and mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/auth/SignUpDialo: Dialog for creating an account with validation, signup mutation, and success confirmation.
frontend/src/components/AuthGate.tsx: Authentication gate handling Internet Identity login, credential login UI, and loading states.
frontend/src/components/customers/Custom: Dialog for adding or editing a customer with backend readiness checks and form validation.
Table to display, edit, and delete customers with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/components/ErrorFallbackScr: UI for displaying application errors with reload and sign-in recovery actions.
frontend/src/components/FirstAdminSetupD: Empty placeholder file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/forms/Scrollable: Wrapper adding scrollability and iOS-friendly behavior to SelectContent.
frontend/src/components/gst/GstProfileSe: Renders a GST profile card showing GSTIN, status badges, and various registration details using reusable rows.
frontend/src/components/invoices/Invoice: Provides a table-based editor for invoice line items, allowing item selection, quantity/price updates, and deletion.
Displays a status badge for invoices based on draft, finalized, or cancelled states.
frontend/src/components/invoices/Monthly: Computes and displays monthly invoice totals including GST breakdowns, with optional month/year filtering.
frontend/src/components/items/ItemFormDi: Dialog form for adding or editing items with validation, mutation hooks, and success/error handling.
frontend/src/components/items/ItemsTable: Shows a table of items with edit and delete actions, including loading and empty states.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Auth button handling Internet Identity login/logout, showing loading states and clearing cached data on sign-out.
frontend/src/components/MobileNav.tsx: Mobile slide-out navigation menu with route links and external E-Way Bill link.
frontend/src/components/PrintLayout.tsx: Minimal authenticated layout for print views that only renders AuthGate, profile setup, and children.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: Dialog prompting new users to enter their name and save their profile before using the app.
frontend/src/components/pwa/IosInstallHe: Dialog explaining step‑by‑step how to install the PWA on iOS through Safari’s Add to Home Screen flow.
frontend/src/components/pwa/PwaInstallFo: UI footer component offering Android and iOS PWA install actions with fallback dialogs and toast notifications.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and maintains a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminCredentialSig: Mutation hook allowing admin credential authentication via the current actor and refreshing admin queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminUserDashboard: Provides hooks to fetch a user's invoice KPIs and find user details from the admin user list.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminUsers.ts: Admin hooks for listing, creating, deleting users and setting access expiry, each tied to backend actor state.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendReady.ts: Checks whether the backend actor is ready and provides a status message for UI use.
frontend/src/hooks/useCredentialSignIn.t: Handles credential login requiring Internet Identity, ensuring identity availability before backend authentication.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Hooks to fetch and save the current caller’s user profile using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and helpers for managing Internet Identity login, state, and stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useIsAdmin.ts: Queries backend to determine whether the authenticated user is an admin with appropriate loading states.
frontend/src/hooks/usePrintOnce.ts: Triggers window.print() once when ready and optionally runs a callback after printing.
frontend/src/hooks/usePwaInstall.ts: Tracks PWA installability, handles beforeinstallprompt events, detects iOS, and exposes an install prompt function.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for CRUD operations on user profiles, business profiles, customers, and related data via an actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/useRecordInternetIden: Provides a helper to asynchronously record Internet Identity sign-ins with retry logic and non-blocking error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useSafeInternetIdenti: Wraps Internet Identity login with automatic stale-session recovery and retry behavior.
frontend/src/hooks/useSignUp.ts: Mutation hook for creating new user accounts through the actor’s sign‑up endpoint.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining color variables, dark mode, safe-area support, touch improvements, and print styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point that mounts React, sets up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPanelPage.tsx: Admin panel page that gates access via admin credentials and displays user management tools once authenticated.
frontend/src/pages/AdminUserDashboardPag: Dashboard page for admins to view a specific user’s details and invoice KPIs with loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/CustomersPage.tsx: Customer management page with search, table display, error handling, and a dialog for creating or editing customers.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Dashboard showing invoice stats, GST totals, setup prompts, and navigation to invoice-related features.
frontend/src/pages/GstFilingStatusPage.t: Page to check GST filing status by GSTIN, financial year, return type, and frequency with search, refresh, and status display.
frontend/src/pages/InvoiceDetailPage.tsx: Displays full invoice details with actions for editing, printing, finalizing, deleting, and cancelling.
frontend/src/pages/InvoiceEditorPage.tsx: Form page for creating or editing invoices, including line items, customer selection, numbering, and totals.
frontend/src/pages/InvoicePrintPage.tsx: Generates a printable invoice view with tax breakdowns, customer details, and automatic print workflow.
frontend/src/pages/InvoicesPage.tsx: Invoice listing page with filters for status, date, year, and month, displaying invoice tables and summaries. Fetches invoices, customers, items, and business profile data.
frontend/src/pages/ItemsPage.tsx: Displays and manages items with search, add, and edit functionality using a dialog and table. Handles loading and error states from the items query.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Business settings form allowing editing of profile, GST, banking details, and logo upload with validation. Loads and saves settings via backend queries.
frontend/src/pwa/registerServiceWorker.t: Registers a service worker, checks for updates periodically, and logs update availability. Handles registration success and failure.
frontend/src/routeTree.tsx: Defines the full TanStack Router route tree including app, print, and admin layouts and all related pages. Configures error handling and nested routes.
frontend/src/utils/adminTimeFormat.ts: Utility functions to format backend nanosecond timestamps into readable date/time strings and convert Date to backend time. Includes validation handling.
frontend/src/utils/amountInWordsINR.ts: Converts numeric amounts into Indian Rupee words using crore, lakh, thousand formats. Includes helpers for number grouping and wording.
frontend/src/utils/appAccessStorage.ts: LocalStorage helpers for storing and clearing app access flags per principal, kept for backward compatibility. Includes functions to clear individual or all entries.
frontend/src/utils/dateFormat.ts: Date utilities for formatting and parsing invoice dates, plus extracting invoice year and month. Handles invalid dates safely.
frontend/src/utils/financialYears.ts: Generates the last five Indian financial year strings based on the current date. Accounts for FY starting in April.
frontend/src/utils/formatters.ts: Provides a simple INR currency formatter using Intl.NumberFormat.
frontend/src/utils/gstCalculations.ts: Computes invoice totals including GST split by CGST/SGST or IGST and provides currency formatting.
frontend/src/utils/gstFilingStatusDispla: Normalizes backend GST filing statuses into clear labels and badge variants.
frontend/src/utils/indianStates.ts: Exports a constant list of Indian states and union territories.
frontend/src/utils/invoiceNumbering.ts: Generates formatted invoice numbers using business profile settings with fallback logic.
frontend/src/utils/invoiceRules.ts: Defines invoice deletion rules, currently allowing all deletions with a fixed error message.
frontend/src/utils/invoiceTaxBreakdown.t: Builds a GST tax breakdown by HSN/SAC, calculating CGST/SGST/IGST totals based on state comparison.
frontend/src/utils/passwordHash.ts: Empty placeholder file for password hashing utilities.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Handles URL and sessionStorage parameters, including retrieval, persistence, and cleanup.
frontend/src/utils/userFacingError.ts: Converts various error types into user-friendly messages with normalization rules.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom colors, fonts, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, architecture notes, issues, and feature registry for GST Pro.
